title: S3 Ep18: John Maynard Keynes's art portfolio
itunes:title: John Maynard Keynes's art portfolio
description: Keynes amassed an extensive collection of fine art during his lifetime. David Chambers tells Tim Phillips what the financial returns on his investment have been, and the insight this gives us into how to value an art portfolio as an asset.Â
